attributes.action: Place a burned out Russian tank outside the Russian embassy in London.
attributes.additional_details: This would be a fantastic visual metaphor which would make the news around the world highlighting what’s going on in Ukraine. It would also put pressure on the Russians and cause embarrassment to them.
attributes.background: I think it would be a fantastic idea to place a burned out Russian tank outside the Russian embassy in London to show the country and the world what is going on in Ukraine.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
